DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to determine the effect of Kinesio taping on lactic acid in an running anaerobic test.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Kinesio Taping in Muscle Fatigue
DOC.criteria: They should practice physical activity 24 days a week. History of surgery in the lower limbs Muscletendon injury or trauma in the lower limbs (LL) in the last six months cardiovascular and / or respiratorydisease Any allergies related to the bandage material.
